function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Risk of contagious diseases from close physical interaction with live plants","Impact":"Potential spread of plant-related diseases among residents","Mitigation":"Educate residents about plant diseases and proper hygiene when interacting with plants","Technologies":"Plant disease monitoring and management systems","People":"Residents, home gardeners","Owner":"Local health authorities, community organizations"},{"Description":"Risk of exposure to noise pollution impacting mental health","Impact":"Long-term health effects from noise pollution, including stress and anxiety","Mitigation":"Implement sound-proofing measures and green barriers to reduce noise pollution","Technologies":"Sound-proofing materials, green acoustic barriers","People":"Residents, urban planners","Owner":"City authorities, urban planning departments"}]}
